alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:12PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lemhi County through 300 PM MDT... At 212 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Gilmore, or 37 miles east of Challis, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leadore, Gilmore and Nicholia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
